experiences.title: Full Stack web developer
experiences.details: Developed a user-friendly app for the Galilee Society using React/Redux. The app enables users to report a hazard anonymously and send that to the right authorities to take care of. Also the users can track their own reports by signing up using Google or Facebook. https://github.com/FACN3/easyRep . Also built an amazing Portfolio: http://marlenawwad.herokuapp.com/

experiences.title: Content Manager
experiences.details: Content Manager as well as in charge of WordPress and SEO
